awscc_msk_serverless_cluster (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::MSK::ServerlessCluster

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • arn (String)
  • client_authentication (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • cluster_name (String)
  • tags (Map of String) A key-value pair to associate with a resource.
  • vpc_configs (Attributes Set) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for client_authentication

Read-Only:

  • sasl (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for client_authentication.sasl

Read-Only:

  • iam (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for client_authentication.sasl.iam

Read-Only:

  • enabled (Boolean)

Nested Schema for vpc_configs

Read-Only:

  • security_groups (Set of String)
  • subnet_ids (Set of String)
